website_summaries.verdict: This heavy-duty option is perfect for any parent seeking colorfol protection for their kid's iPad mini.
pros: Comes with a built-in screen protector
Raised edges around the screen provide excellent preservation for glass
Buyers highly recommend the drop and shock protection offered by the durable design
cons: Kickstand can lean iPad back farther than buyers might anticipate

customer_reviews.title: Great case for kids
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous about purchasing this but it was in really good shape. My son is 11 and he is rough on his iPad and this case can take it. He has an iPad mini 4 and this fit perfectly. It’s actually a replacement for an identical one that lasted about a year... the round stand in the back had broken at the connect point, but it was such a great case that it was worth repurchasing. If you’re looking for durable, can take a drop, this case is it. It’s like a very, very dense styrofoam.
customer_reviews.author: mdchick
